title: Did Congress use a "false box " to pay $17 million to sexually harassed women?
subtitle: Although the term "fertilized funds" refers to secret funds hidden for illicit purposes, Congress authorized public funds in a fund earmarked for payment of settlements.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Congress has a "big box" of which $17 million has been paid to women who have accused members of sexual harassment or abuse.
